DocumentAttachmentMap.name: DocumentAttachmentMap
DocumentAttachmentMap.description: Maps the relationship between an EmailTemplate and its attachment, which is stored as a Document.

DocumentId.description: ID of the document that this object tracks.

DocumentSequence.description: Represents the order that the attachments will be included in the email defined by the EmailTemplate specified by the DocumentId. Label is Attachment Sequence. The first attachment is given a value of 0, and each subsequent attachment is given a value incremented by 1.

ParentId.description: ID of the EmailTemplate parent. The attachment identified by DocumentId is attached to the EmailTemplate specified in this field.
